All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CardsParsingException
The CardsParsingException class represents an exception that is thrown when there is an error parsing cards in the application.
Game
Represents a generic game class.
GameDictionary
The GameDictionary class is a utility class that dynamically discovers and creates instances of all subclasses of the Game class in the specified package.
GameForTestOnly
The GameForTestOnly class is a subclass of the Game class, created specifically for testing purposes.
IntAndString
The IntAndString record is a simple data structure that holds an integer value and a string.
InvalidMoveException
The InvalidMoveException class represents an exception that is thrown when a player attempts to make an invalid move in the game.
PlayerDisconnectedException
The PlayerDisconnectedException class represents an exception that is thrown when a player disconnects unexpectedly from the game.
Poker
Represents the Poker game implementation, extending the base Game class.
